While you are encouraged to RSVP here on the Random site to communicate and coordinate with other randomites, you will need to purchase your own tickets from the Regent Theater (information below).

=====

Created 36 years ago, the Banff Mountain Film and Book Festival has become the premier event of its kind in the world. The Festival showcases the world’s best films, books, and photographs on mountain subjects – climbing, culture, environment, wildlife, exploration and adventure, and sport. It also attracts the biggest names in mountaineering, adventure filmmaking, and extreme sports as presenters and speakers.

More than 70 films were screened during the nine-day festival and the Banff Mountain Film Festival World Tour brings Banff to audiences around the globe. Immediately after the Festival ends, a selection of the best films go on tour across Canada, the United States, and internationally from Scotland to South Africa to China, Japan, New Zealand, Antarctica, and points in between.

Each year, the films travel to 32 countries reaching more than 245,000 people at over 635 screenings. Host organizations in each tour location choose a program that reflects the interests of their local audiences from a selection of films on exploration and adventure, culture and environment, and mountain sports.

The proceeds of many tour screenings benefit a local outdoor program, community cause, or a non-profit such as youth adventure and outdoor pursuit programs, search and rescue operations, climbing clubs, adaptive sport programs, conservation groups, and trail maintenance organizations.

There are three nights of films - different films will play each night. Go to one, two, or all three nights.

  • Monday February 20 @ 7:00 PM
  • Tuesday February 21 @ 7:00 PM
  • Wednesday February 22 @ 7:00 PM

Tickets will be on sale soon - click here for the link to purchase tickets from the Regent Theater. Contact the Regent Theater at (781) 646-4849 if you have any questions or if you want to purchase tickets.

Click here for more information about the film festival itself, including a full listing and movie clips from the films that will be on tour.
